title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: February 06, 2023, 04:02:26 PMLast edit: November 05, 2024, 01:29:25 PM by mx12.levins
content: Hello Bitcointalk community member and Bitcoin art collector I am creating bitcoin art since 2017. This creation of art will speak for itself:) We all know....Introducing the "The Rise of Zeus: The Power of the Lightning Network" .02Limited Edition Prints - Hand-Signed and verified Once upon a time in a world controlled by fiat currency,the people lived in a bleak and desolate city, plagued by slow and unreliable transactions.But then, a beacon of hope appeared in the form of Zeus, the god of lightning.Armed with the power of the Lightning Network, Zeus embarked on a journey to revolutionize the financial system and bring prosperity back to the city.He leapt into action, jumping over the flying fiat notes and wielding the lightning in his hand.With each step, the power of the Lightning Network grew stronger, enabling faster and cheaper transactions for all.The people marveled at Zeus's bravery and ingenuity, and they knew that their financial future was finally secure.But the journey was not without its challenges.The forces of the old financial system, embodied by the dark city in the background,sought to resist this change and maintain their grip on the people's wealth.But Zeus was determined. With his lightning-fast transactions and unwavering commitment to the people,he proved that the Lightning Network was more than just a technology ‚Äì it was a symbol of hope and a better future for all.And so, the people of the city celebrated the rise of Zeus and the arrival of a new era of financial freedom and prosperity,powered by the Lightning Network.Availability:1. SOLD Acrylic Panel2. SOLD Acrylic Panel  1PoHH1xvJKZ2yAJS47opVDyvAnVzSs4Smj3. AVAILABLE Acrylic Panel Location: London gallery4.5.6.7.8.9.10.11.12.Sale DetailsOnly 12 unique pieces available(choose Golden or Color)Payment address: [3PppFQbyT2AkpyF4fY2XFcvuPqHQSmmNYT]size: 17x25 Inch(44,6x64,6cm)material: Alu-Dibond, Hahnemuehle FineArt or Acrylic  - (For my Plebs this is Hand laminated to aluminum)is loadable:You can load artwork with bitcoin amount you want, people standard load amount is 1,200,000 sats or 0.012 BTCPricing:Framed Aluminium panel:if you don't see the price ticker refresh the page BTC= per piece (approx. $550 USD)US shipping: 50-70$EU shipping: 20$How to Purchase1.Send the required amount of Bitcoin to the provided payment address2.Send a message to the seller on Bitcointalk with your shipping address(privnote)3.The seller will confirm receipt of payment and ship the artwork to the provided address4.Enjoy your one-of-a-kind, hand-signed and block-stamped Bitcoin artwork!Bitcointalk strong together ¬† ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîFeel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0
